website_summaries.verdict: A very soft, affordable option that comes in three attractive colors.
pros: Solid color choice filled with a hypoallergenic down alternative fill
Includes two shams and can be easily washer
cons: Material is somewhat thin, and may be damaged if dried on high heat setting

customer_reviews.title: Very warm
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in Queen size for my sons bed and he loves it, we needed a heavier blanket for the upcoming winter months and this is perfect. Amazon had the cream and brown chocolate colors listed for $15 but right after I bought mine the price went up to $39 in line with all the other colors,
customer_reviews.author: 97guns

customer_reviews.title: Off color
customer_reviews.text: Two main flaws: 1.) it’s not nearly as plush and fluffy as pictured. The quilting squares lay relatively flat. 2.) the color is off. Pictured it looks a deep burgundy. It’s bright red. And the bright red combined with the white Sherpa underside reminds me of Santa clauses uniform. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: Wow, wow, wow
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is better than expected. It is so soft and comfortable. Also very warm.
customer_reviews.author: kim taylor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love how it looks. It was for my boyfriend and he loved it too. A little thin compared to the Sherpa comforters I’ve gotten, but I think that’s a good think as I get super hot in mine.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for my teenage son & he loves it. Soft and plush, not "flat" like his previous set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits Cali king perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Exactly what I wanted for my Cali King size bed and it fits perfectly. Super soft and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: Soft and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Simply beautiful! I ordered this when I was redeorating my room and it's gorgeous. It's very soft and the indide (which is a white, fluffy texture) is nice too. So it's reversable. I baught it in red, for a twin bed but I chose the full b/c I wanted the end of the comforter to hit the floor. Did I mention that it's soft. It reminds me of christmas, to be honest. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Queen Charles

customer_reviews.title: Value!!
customer_reviews.text: We just got this to replace another comforter that was ruined when my husband washed about 6 months ago (Gain Fling pod didn’t dissolve and melted to it). We just got this yesterday, but already love it!!! The pillow cases are a little bit much, but cute. The comforter is soooo warm!
customer_reviews.author: Amber P.

customer_reviews.title: Micromink Sherpa Plush Comforter
customer_reviews.text: This is the softest comforter I have ever owned! It is extremely warm and cozy on a winter night. After I took it out of the box, I washed it and it held up with no shedding - plus it plumped up significantly. The ivory color is closer to cream than white. It matches my sheets quite well. I look forward to feeling and cuddling up with this comforter every day. I ordered it in the king size because I wanted it to fit over my large queen mattress and hang down over the sides. It is also a good price point. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Good price but..
customer_reviews.text: Sheds! The white faux Sherpa sheds too much. I dread the first washing. It’s super soft and warm but the shedding is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Christalpistol

customer_reviews.title: Mine came with stitching issues
customer_reviews.text: The reason this product is getting a 3 is because although the material is nice..... mine came with stitching problems. In some spots it looks like the machine snagged and has a build up of thread and in another area the thread is popped and coming undone. Definitely an eyesore.
customer_reviews.author: Becka M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: This is warm, soft and cuddly. Everytime my daughter cozies up under this quilt to watch tv she's out cold in less than 10 minutes! Great product and at a really good price.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: Not cream! It’s yellow
customer_reviews.text: Love the blanket but it’s yellow not cream which is a huge bummer. It looks bad. I’m bummed b/c it’s a good blanket but I care about how it looks. If you don’t, then thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Cirone

customer_reviews.title: Great coverlet first the money
customer_reviews.text: I expected this to be more like a comforter in the thickness or dense ness of the blanket, but after sleeping under it, you do not need the extra padding between the topside and underside. You stay very warm even though it’s so much lighter weight than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a comforter, think blanket
customer_reviews.text: It is a two sided Blanket, Not a comforter. I would have had a better deal if I would have bought a regular blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is super comfy! If you are a hot sleeper this blanket is not for you this blanket will keep you warm for sure! Great quality soft plush well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Camron

customer_reviews.title: Best Winter Comforter
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the warmest bedcover you could ask for. I'm so glad I bought it. The sherpa lining is a real bonus, and adds a luxurious feel.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia M.

customer_reviews.title: Very soft
customer_reviews.text: I actually didn’t realize this was Sherpa when I ordered it so I was really suprised. Both side of the blanket are incredibly soft, it’s definitely the warmest blanket I’ve ever owned!
customer_reviews.author: Carigan

customer_reviews.title: Cozy but not pleasing to the eye
customer_reviews.text: It is definitely soft but not as plush as pictured. It is warm but not too warm. The colored material on the outside is very shiny. It definitely doesn’t look the greatest but it is incredibly soft and cozy! It will work well for the spare bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for my money
customer_reviews.text: Loved it like I just bought a brand new bed. Laying under this blanket is soft I wanna another 1
customer_reviews.author: Lizabeth_henry

customer_reviews.title: Very soft!
customer_reviews.text: Really good but I would HIGHLY re come y getting the twin size if you have a full sized bed. Queen/full is just too big.
customer_reviews.author: Vikki

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Obsesssed with this new comforter and pillow cases! My 8 year old insists on getting the same one. Great price. Super soft and arrives earlier than expected! Super happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable ❤️
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I blended it so well with my favorite print, and it came out beautifully Very comfortable everything about it I love so much! Totally recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok.
customer_reviews.text: The color wasn’t what I expected. I got Santa clause suit red and it’s not a color that matches with a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Ulloa

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Color
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift and was surprised they loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Kiowa

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Super soft! Has a silky-soft side and a plush side which I enjoy. A little wrinkly which seems pretty permanent but I don't mind. Awesome comforter for 20 dollars, I'll be ordering another for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah R

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and sweet :)
customer_reviews.text: Used for my daughters new 14 year old big girl room. It was extremely nice, soft, thick, good quality ... She loved it :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy weight and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed on the softness and thickness of the comforter. It is well made and heavy weight. You definitely do not need more than this comforter too keep you warm. The color is vibrant and makes my bed look great. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: LARRY DIAZ

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: My daughter says it is the beat comforter shes had. Soft, silky, great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and well made
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it, it feels like the adult version of a toddler's blanket. It is super soft, similar to the texture of a plush animal, yet it is thick enough and sturdy. Definitely well made and I recommend this for the cold seasons.
customer_reviews.author: Jovany Rojas Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Soft and cozy!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this blanket!!! It’s super soft and keeps me very warm. I have a king size bed therefore I got a king size. I like when my comforter covers the sides of my bed. This blanket doesn’t, which is the only bad thing I have to say. Otherwise great blanket!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Soft, warm and cozy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my younger brother who really loves soft things and he loves it. I got it for Christmas and I can still see him walking around the house wrapped up in it. It’s warm and cozy!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Maynard

customer_reviews.title: Cheap materials
customer_reviews.text: Sherpa is faux and I don't think that's in the description. Feels very cheap and I'm sure will look disgusting on the first wash.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer 2019

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money...
customer_reviews.text: True to color and size..very soft and warm...love everything about it... Will order one for my daughter's room
customer_reviews.author: Bennie & Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Thinner than expected
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as "puffy" as I expected but it's very nice and soft, pretty color. Great for layering.
customer_reviews.author: fred

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: So soft!! Makes you not ever want to get out of bed! I've washed once and had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Rains

customer_reviews.title: Color bleeding
customer_reviews.text: Followed washing directions exactly and the red dye still bled into the white part.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: burnt in the dryer
customer_reviews.text: i didn’t know i wasn’t supposed to put it in my dryer came out a lil crusty LOL i burnt it a bit. but other than that i really enjoy this blanket. it’s very soft and warm. my cat loves how soft it is too (:
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Great blanket
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Came clean and well made. Very very soft material best blanket I've gotten. Only thing that could have made it better was more of the fluffy stuffing.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Baker

customer_reviews.title: definitely recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Omg i love the set so big and fits my king size bed perfectly i will buy more if price don't go up
customer_reviews.author: Jeesoo

customer_reviews.title: Quality and warmth
customer_reviews.text: I just love this!! Well made and very soft and cozy. Looks very chic. It is very warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: Have this to my son for his birthday....he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: It's great
customer_reviews.text: Warm, fluffy, comfortable and good quality. My husband is obsessed with it!
customer_reviews.author: NadiaS

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY ISSUES
customer_reviews.text: THE PRODUCT WAS NOT AS EXPECTED. THE MATERIAL IS CHEAP AND THE PRODUCT WAS NOT MADE WELL EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTED WITH IT NOT A GOOD VALUE OF THE COST
customer_reviews.author: E FLANAGAN

customer_reviews.title: Warm, soft and a great value!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Just wish it came in California king size.
customer_reviews.author: Antonette Stiebritz

customer_reviews.title: Snuggle town
customer_reviews.text: I do wish this game with matching sheets both otherwise it is a great set for a snuggly couple
customer_reviews.author: Storm Anaya

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Great comforter my son took it off my bed to use because it was so comfy
customer_reviews.author: Pia Pie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is extremely comfortable. It’s helped me get a better sleep at night & it’s weighted. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes me never want to leave my bed
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this comforter. It is so soft and warm. I makes me never what to leave my bed.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Squires

customer_reviews.title: Having a good night rest
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy it is very soft and I sleep all night did not have to wake up and be cold
customer_reviews.author: Anthony McWilliams

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love my new comforter it's so soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Afonso Comellas

customer_reviews.title: Love it !
customer_reviews.text: The arrival time was fast ! It’s comfortable, soft , just as pictured ! Thanks ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Brown

customer_reviews.title: Winter Bed Cover
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would be a little heavier.but its ok. OK for the price
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Brown

customer_reviews.title: Very warm- great quality for price
customer_reviews.text: A lot warmer than I expected. Love the gray color and the Sherpa fuzz!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Maewsky

customer_reviews.title: Soft, warm, fluffy, value for money
customer_reviews.text: This is the best blanket I’ve ever owned. This is very soft, warm and fluffy. The size was bigger than expected. This makes my bed look like hotel beds. Value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Isha Palot

customer_reviews.title: Just get it
customer_reviews.text: super soft, not thick but feels thicker then it is and very warm. Love it. I use it as a comforter. Its perfect for winter
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Cheep
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was cheeply made, the white fur on the inside is not what I expected. To me it's only good for Christmas wish I would have ordered something different.
customer_reviews.author: John Bird

customer_reviews.title: nice fit
customer_reviews.text: nice fit very comfortable will not hesitate to buy another color
customer_reviews.author: GLEN

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels luxurious, love to sleep under this comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Davis

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This set is comfortable, looks great on the bed, and is reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Tahoe Wolf

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: the softness is wonderful and the color is a 'wow!" MY GRANDSON LOVES IT.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR
customer_reviews.text: WORST SUPPOSE TO BE SHERPA COMFORTER I EVER SEEN. SHOULD HAVE LISTEN TO THE OTHER REVIEWS.BIG LONG SLOPPY BLANKET
customer_reviews.author: bowlingballs

customer_reviews.title: It's good
customer_reviews.text: It's not really a comforter, it's more of a blanket but it's warm and it does the job
customer_reviews.author: A

product_meta.title: KingLinen 3 Piece Micromink Sherpa Silky Smooth Plush Oversized Ivory Comforter Set Full/Queen
product_meta.description: Size:Full/Queen| Color:IvoryKeep yourself warm and cozy with this Micromink Sherpa comforter set. This ultra soft comforter set features silky smooth Micromink with Sherpa reverse to provide ultimate sleep comfort. The box quilting adds a contemporary style to your decor. Comforter is oversized with hypoallergenic polyester filling. 3-Piece comforter set includes 1 comforter, 2 shams; comforter 90-inch by 90-inch, shams 20-inch by 26-inch; Comforter set fabric content: 100-percent polyester; Color: Ivory; Washing instructions: machine wash in cold water, tumble dry low;
feature_bullets: Silky smooth micromink reverses to sherpa fleece;Plush down alternative hypoallergenic polyester filling
Machine washable; Comforter and Shams 100% Polyester

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars220 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
